archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Record Party Bill Inquiry Resolution
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Resolve a party bill inquiry and record how an inquiry was resolved.

properties.value: Record Party Bill Inquiry Resolution resolves a party bill inquiry and records how the inquiry was resolved. Resolution may have been reached via the Make Party Bill/Invoice Adjustment process, a party accepting the content of a bill/invoice which resulted in a party bill inquiry, or some other reason.
